name: Dexterity Ball 3Dâ„¢
description: Dexterity Ball 3D is an unconstrained, physics and skills based platform game, which can be played in three modes. There is no convoluted back story or adventure included. Your goal: collect all the gems as fast as possible. Are you ready to be challenged?!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel I3 or similar Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10/11 compatible Display Device DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Decent quality online connection required for peer-to-peer multiplayer
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel I5 or higher Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible Display Device DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Decent quality online connection required for peer-to-peer multiplayer
